memo: Thank you for a wonderful software that I use almost every day, both at work and at home.
Thanks pour Inkscape continué de l'amélioré  !
Inkscape rocks! Thanks for providing a lovely alternative to the claws of Illustrator.
Thanks for your great software. It was just what I was looking for to create icons for my new app.
Love the software. Love the ethos.
(Anonymous donation)  Thanks a lot for Inkscape, and keep on the good work. I use Inkscape for the figures in all my publications.

I used Inkscape extensively for the preparation of figures for my PhD thesis. It's a great program with high quality output, and I hope my donation will help improve it even further. Keep up the good work!
